   contain the root `toctree` directive.

CAME
====

CAME is a tool for Cell-type Annotation and Module Extraction,
based on a heterogeneous graph neural network.


.. image:: _static/rrgcn_structure0.png
   :width: 500px

.. toctree::
   :caption: Contents
   :maxdepth: 1

   installation
   tutorials
   api
   citation



Contribute
----------

- Issue Tracker: https://github.com/XingyanLiu/CAME/issues
- Source Code: https://github.com/XingyanLiu/CAME

Support
-------

If you are having issues, please let us know.
We have a mailing list located at:

* xingyan@amss.ac.cn
* 544568643@qq.com
